actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970 to reduce the amount a State, regional, or local agency may be required to reimburse the National Railroad Passenger Corporation for certain rail passenger service provided by the Corporation.

summary.text: Reduces from 66 2/3 percent to 33 1/3 percent the amount a State, regional, or local agency may be required to reimburse the National Railroad Passenger Corporation for rail passenger service provided by the Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Rail Passenger Service Act of 1970 to reduce the amount a State, regional, or local agency may be required to reimburse the National Railroad Passenger Corporation for certain rail passenger service provided by the Corporation.
